biotools.summary: BCR evaluator is used to evaluate bisulfite conversion ratio in whole genome shotgun bisulfite sequencing (WGSBS) experiment. BCReval is a small python script to estimate the unconverted rate (UCR) by using telomeric repetitive DNA as native spike-in control.

bioschemas.name: BCREval
bioschemas.summary: BCR evaluator is used to evaluate bisulfite conversion ratio in whole genome shotgun bisulfite sequencing (WGSBS) experiment. BCReval is a small python script to estimate the unconverted rate (UCR) by using telomeric repetitive DNA as native spike-in control.
